reviews.review: I loved this game but I have now developed a special hate for striders
all because i had played on a different computer the saves dont save onto my other computer for some reason and now i have to replay 3 hours of progress, probably just give up on the game anyways
Tão bom e imersivo como o primeiro! Recomendo.
不论从故事性，游戏大背景还是射击手感等方面来讲，这玩意如果来个高清画质+小地图的话你说它是2020年出的我都信。

Öncelikle şunu söylemeliyim ki oyunu oynamadan önce Makine'nin hazırladığı olağanüstü Half-Life belgeselini izledim. Dolayısıyla hikaye, zombiler, Peder Grigori vs. benim için sürpriz değildi. Ancak yine de oyunu çok sevdim. Gravity Gun'ın mekanikleri mükemmel, silah çeşitliliği olması gerektiği gibi. Bir tek karakter biraz hızlı geldi. Onun dışında aksiyonu da, gerilimi de, bulmacaya benzer bölümleri de harika. Hatta açıkça söyleyebilirim ki korkak bir oyuncu olmama rağmen gece pc'nin başına kurulup HL2 oynamak istedim. Özellikle Ravenholm bölümünde bu isteğim tavan yapmıştı. Allah'tan, iradem ve oto-kontrol sistemim buna izin vermedi. :D Her neyse son olarak diyeceklerim şunlar; grafikler 2004 yapımı bir oyuna göre oldukça iyi, kesinlike eski hissettirmiyor, mekanikler ve mekan tasarımları çok güçlü, Ravenholm bölümü aşırı zevkli, deli gibi adrenalin pompalıyorsunuz. 

Benim için belki mükemmel bir iz bırakır, belki bırakmaz. Onu şimdi kestirmek zor ancak oyunu yeni bitirdiğim şu dakikalarda "D E H Ş E T   İ Y İ" bir oyun olduğunu gönül rahatlığıyla söyleyebilirim.

Not: Adanalı arkadaşlar alınmasın ama Allah'ın Adamı G-Man galiba. sdknfısngdjkn
Not 2: İngilizcem kötü olduğu için oyunu Türkçe yama ile oynadım, teşekkürler www.oyunceviri.net

Having gotten all the achievements on normal difficulty, i can comfortably say this is one of the best games ever made, or at the very least i have ever played. Trying to be as objective here as i can, this is as close as it gets to a flawless game. perfect blent of gameplay,story,music,atmosphere. Having played so many games, very few have left me this stunned. cliche yes, but everyone is saying this is right. if you haven't played this......how and why? obvious must buy. along with the episodes.
Игра очень классная я её всем советую брать !
not having this game is a sin at this point
This game aged really well, you can still play it today and appreciate the amazing work that the team put into this story line.
it's the ripoff of gmod bad gaem

Half-Life 2 jest według mnie wręcz perfekcyjną grą fabularną. Uczucia postaci dalej są mocno widoczne, mimo że od wydania minęło prawie 20 lat. Rozgrywka jest po prostu świetna, grafika zachwyca, a inteligencja AI jest po prostu cudowna, jak na lata 2000. Cała seria Half-Life jest arcydziełem i żałuję, że poznałem ją dopiero teraz. Polecam.

It is amazing how timeless this game is. From the amazing gameplay, being linear and exploratory at the same time, to the fantastic enviromental story telling, being that it breaks the 4th wall, seeing how opressive the combine is, etc. It is just timeless masterpiece, a true successor to hl1.
The game's worthwhile even in 2021, though it does feel like it drags on at chapter 11, that is the only time when i felt the game wasn't amazing in every way.

Кароч, заходишь в обсуждения игр в каком-нибудь паблике с овердохрена подписчиками (в основном с школьниками, ну там, ИГМ какой-нибудь...) и начинаешь обсуждение "Как вам запомнился второй Халф-Лайф2 ?". Ничего из дальнейшего писанного истинным не будет, никто игру не ценит.
А вот есть индивиды, которые сбежали из Сити-17 без лодочки, а потом жалуются почему тут карты такие тяжёлые и не знают как перепрыгнуть пропасть. Сука, люди тупеют.
А как игра? А, ну норм.
СПС ГЕЙБ ЗА ЭТУ ХАЛФУ ЧЁРНОГО ЦВЕТА 20 ВЕКА

good game with a lot of little shitty areas.
overall experience is fantastic though.
10/10 for being the sequel to half life
I Cannot express how good this game is even if i tried. BUY

As someone who loves the older games (Modern Warfare, bf1942 and such), this game was always on my playlist. This is my first PC and this is one of the first games i bought. The missions are well designed and each one leaves a mark on you. (the air boat especially because i kept getting motion sickness LMAO) I strongly recommend you get this, its worth the money.
Esta divertido y dura lo menos que las cinemáticas de Death Stranding

this is a certified 'Classic' bro, if half life or the source games in general didn't exist, gaming would be totally different
After years of playing Half-Life, I just noticed how bad the trailer looks

EPIC! Better than half-life 1. (If just barely). This thing was really fun, and a good time sink during summer break. I would rate it higher if it had the cheat commands from half life 1 (and some of the half life 1 weapons, if just for the cheat menu. I mean, we got those weapons "Working" in the source engine already. Some bug fixes and it would be really fun) I only want the cheat menu because I already finished the story, and after that theres not much to do, so some physics exploits would be fun
To be honest this game is gold but it gets boring at the end of the game.

不得不说，这款04年的游戏放到现在依旧能打。那宏伟的世界观，那精巧的细节，那样的画面，堪称完美的代入感，即使是现在也值得你去游玩，还在犹豫什么呢？拿起你的撬棍吧！
